description:
At least one on-again-off-again McKinley High couple is getting a happy ending on Glee.McKinley 高中又一对恋人将会在《欢乐合唱团》里活的幸福结局。

On Friday, star Naya Rivera shared a photo of a wedding veil on Instagram and teased an "exciting day" on the set of the Fox musical comedy, which returns for its sixth and final season on Friday, Jan. 9 at 8/7c on Fox.周五，《欢乐合唱团》明星Naya在Instagram上分享了一张在FOX音乐剧拍摄现场婚纱头纱的照片，并写着“兴奋的一天”。《欢乐合唱团》第六季也就是该剧的最后一季将会在北京时间1月10日回归。

But that's not all. Brittana won't be the only Glee couple walking down the aisle this season, as TVLine reports that there's another (mystery!) pair headed for altar.不过好消息还没结束。Brittana不会是《欢乐合唱团》本季唯一一对结婚的情侣，TVLine报道，剧中还有另外一对情侣也将走上婚姻礼堂。

title: 《欢乐合唱团》最后一季1月10日回归
